description:
The first time it works, but the other successive times did not work, even after a few restarts.
The same for the other product - cloud backup .
Running on Fedora 32, but in order to get the tray to display properly, you need to get the gnome extension "Appindicator and kstatusnotifieritme support"
summary: Works with a bit of setup

description: this little app does the trick for keeping things synchronized and can be configured for automatic or manual sync, nice but you DO need AppIndicator or Topicons as noted elsewhere in rating review!
summary: Excellent app for an extremely useful device!

description: The app is outdated and doesn't sync. Upgrading it is impossible.
Love the idea, wish it worked with dsm7 and wish we could get synology notes Im so keen on this working

debian bookworm. Client fails in setup with message "something went wrong please restart". Doesn't restart. Multiple installations and no solution. I also tried to install Active Business Backup through CLI and that also failed to install. Quite disappointed since these seem like very helpful tools. I was almost very impressed with synoolgy. almost.
Does work.. However as stated elsewhere, you must install the gnome extension - AppIndicator and KStatusNotifierItem Support for you to see the drive folder.
summary: It Works! But needs extension support

description: Long time user of Synology Drive, now on DSM 7, with Windows and Linux (Fedora 35) Clients. Works as intended. Because of Gnome 41 these package needs the "AppIndicator an KStatusNotifierItem Support" extension in order to show the app symbol and app status on the status bar when running in background.
Not working anymore on Steam Deck. Worked once, never again after :(
automatisierter Zugriff auf die private cloud. Ich liebe meine Synology.
Me alegra saber que endless la tiene en su repositorio
Juste un petit soucis avec l'icon tray qui ne s'affiche pas au démarrage mais sinon c'est parfait merci !

l'icon tray en haut a droite n'affiche pas l'icone de l'application mais un menu "3 petits points" et quand on clique dessus, il faut cliquer sur "menu de la barre d'état système" pour faire apparaitre le volet du drive.

Pas bien méchant mais peut surprendre un non initié.
Problème vu sous fedora 34 (gnome 40) et ce problème existait déjà sur fedora 33 (gnome 3.38)
summary: Fais bien son taff, juste icon tray qui a un probleme

description:
Merci de propôser cette utilitaire au format flatpack mais pourriez-vous proposer la dernière version pour qu'elle puisse fonctionner sous DSM 7.0 ?

--> https://www.synology.com/fr-fr/releaseNote/SynologyDriveClient

Thank you for owning this utility in flatpack format but could you offer the latest version so that it can work under DSM 7.0?

--> https://www.synology.com/fr-fr/releaseNote/SynologyDriveClient

Ну наконец-то! Synology забил на поддержку rpm пакетов, оставив только deb. Упаковка в flatpak - отличное решение.
Пишу про версию 2.0.2. Использую для синхронизации данных с офисным NAS.
Немного кривовата в клиенте настройка локальной папки для загрузки в плане предложенной структуры папок, но это пока следствие песочницы flatpak.

В конечном итоге всё работает, как должно. Ура!
summary: С офисным NAS работает на ура
